title: The Cutler Brothers Series
description: The Cutler Brother Series combines three very popular erotic spanking romances into one print volume. Read about "Cade," a US Marshall who rescues a woman in the Witness Protection Program from herself, among other things. Then read about his brother, "Madoc," who is trapped by a snowstorm with a fugitive he's trying to bring in, and forced in the process to confront the truth about her. Then, in "The Cutler Brides," Cade and Madoc's new brides, Riley and Shayna confront a mystery of their own. Three novels, twenty two total chapters in one volume!
author: Paige Tyler
